definitions.text: (biology) tiny fibers that are seen in cell division; the fibers radiate from two poles and meet at the equator in the middle
examples: chromosomes are distributed by spindles in mitosis and meiosis

definitions.text: a piece of wood that has been turned on a lathe; used as a baluster, chair leg, etc.
any of various rotating shafts that serve as axes for larger rotating parts
a stick or pin used to twist the yarn in spinning
any holding device consisting of a rigid, sharp-pointed object
examples: the spike pierced the receipts and held them in order
